text: - Merck is a premier research-intensive
biopharmaceutical company,

and we use the power of
leading-edge science to save
and improve lives across the world.
With the increasing demand for data

and analytics to drive
process efficiencies

and effectiveness across
the manufacturing area,

our legacy data platform
was not able to keep up
with the demand.

And that was what brought
us to AWS to really look

for a new platform that's
scalable, flexible,
and cost-effective to operate.

We have built a holistic
data ecosystem in AWS

to bring data from over
hundreds of source systems

across the manufacturing
domain, integrate it, curate it,
and then provide different types

of analytics capabilities
for our users to interact
with this ecosystem.
Throughout the journey,
it has been a great partnership with AWS.

We're seeing a threefold
increase in performance,
at least 50% decrease in operating costs,

as well as significant
introduction in time
to make data available to our users.
What we are doing is democratizing the use
of data through self-service mechanisms,

through the ability to
build structured solutions,
as well as provide AIML capabilities
on the data for advanced analytics.
And all this ultimately means

that we are helping the
company deliver the medicines
to the patients we serve.
